modName: FavBar - Categorized Favorites Menu custom config
summary:
Splits the Favorite menu into 5 categories and places it in a bar that goes across the screen below your compass, above the crosshair. Updated for Better Sorting and Tytanis
-REQUIRES Categorized Favorites Menu by Favmenumodder
descriptionHtml:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
NOT A STANDALONE MOD. This is an edited config file of Categorized Favorites Menu 
by Favmenumodder. Please install v1.6 before installing this mod.

http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4862
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

####################################################################
Update 0.3 - Tytanis Compatibility 
Added all spells/shouts, most items (the ones that will end up being favorited)
If there\'s anything else useful that\'s being mis-sorted, please comment.
Coming Soon: JaySuS alternate sword names being added

1/8 Found several mis-sorted items such as Frostbite Venom. Will update with a fix soon 
####################################################################

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Works WITH or WITHOUT Headbomb\'s Better Sorting (comment if there is a problem)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Categorized Favorites Menu takes the small vanilla menu and expands it into multiple
configurable lists, and since it\'s so easy to configure it\'s definitely worth messing around with to
find out how you like it positioned, how the lists work, etc. 

This is just my version that I am uploading by request from the Custom Configurations thread. 

FavBar changes the standard position, categories, and columns of the default CFM so it takes up
less screenspace while still having room to quickly find everything you need. The addition of
sublists in version 1.6 of CFM made this even better. It\'s been moved to the top so you can still
see your hands/what you have currently equipped.

One cosmetic difference I\'m going to try and figure out is how to fade out the lists at the top
and bottom similar to the vanilla list, it might blend better. This will be optional if I do figure it out.

The current version SHOULD be fully compatible with Headbomb\'s Better Sorting, and Tytanis.
I\'m currently in the works of updating this to be compatible with 3E Weapons, Midas Magic,
Deadly Dragons, etc.

PLEASE READ THE README!
Update for Better Sorting also included many other unique items such as masks that are now
sorted properly. Only comment if things are rediculously awry and I will try to fix it.

Please Endorse and/or Comment with your thoughts! :]

-------------------------------
INSTALL

Make sure you have version 1.6 of Categorized Favorites Menu installed.
Copy and replace \"favoritesmenu.cfg\" file from the RAR into your
Skyrim/Data/Interface folder.
It should ask you to overwrite a file, click yes.

Comment if there are problems with this

CHANGELOG

VER 0.3 - Tytanis compatibility added (Same as before, comment with bugs)
VER 0.2.1 - \"Paralyze\" Poison mis-sort fixed
VER 0.2 - Compatible with Headbomb\'s Better Sorting (Comment with bugs)
VER 0.1 - Initial release
author: Pickel5857
